fields.name: The Surgebinder
fields.content:
Abilities:
Psionic
Spearman
Magical conduit capable of performing special spells called “Lashings”
Highly athletic
Does not seem to age

Aesthetic:
Dark complexion
Auburn hair
Green eyes
Facial
Young

Personality:
Distant
Paranoid
Suspicious
Guarded

Accompanied by a Wind Elemental named Syl who is of a bright and curious disposition

fields.name: Cervantes
fields.content:
Abilities:
Biophysical/biochemical reaction triggered at will allows teleportation
Accomplished swordsman, fencer
Does not sleep
Admiral of a fleet of Privateers, owns a ship called the Golden Hind
Increased lifespan

Aesthetic:
Short, greying hair
Bloodshot eyes
Medium height and build
Fair complexion, windswept
Dresses below his station

Personality:
Loud
Quick-witted
Addicted to sleepless potions
Hot tempered
Fierce

fields.name: The Spiritfarer
fields.content:
Abilities:
- Antinecromancer
- Charter/Rune Mage
- Wields a bandolier of bells capable of controlling the dead
- Fights undead using necromantic magic
- Wild magic expert

Aesthetic:
- Pale complexion
- Black hair
- Blue eyes
- Middle-aged
- Weathered

Personality:
- Quiet
- Calm
- Brave
- Tenacious
- Serious

Accompanied by a talking white cat named Mogget, who wears a collar bearing a small version of the bell Saraneth

fields.name: The Architect
fields.content:
Abilities:
Hyper Intelligent
Living Tissue over a biomechanical endoskeleton
Equipped with vocals capable of mimicking any speech patterns
Does not feel pain
Redundant systems allow it to continue operating even after sustaining severe damage

Aesthetic:
Short, dark hair
Partial damage to face and body revealing endoskeleton underneath
Tall and muscular
Clean shaven and handsome on undamaged side of face
Eye with no living tissue covering it glows red

Personality:
Inquisitive
Scientific
Unattached
Calm
Workaholic

fields.name: The Dark Death
fields.content:
Abilities:
Telekinesis
Super Strength
Master Swordsman

Headquarters:
Hightusk

Origin:
Unknown

fields.name: The Eater of Stars
fields.content:
Abilities:
Necromancer
Control of his own magical domain
Strong Melee Combatant

Headquarters:
Hoia-Baciu Forest

Origin:
Quiet Rise. Lived there before the war. After the war had begun, he performed some kind of dark magic ritual involving a power stone to kill all inhabitants of the town as well as the surrounding forest. Making the forest his personal domain, he stayed locked in a battle for control with three iterations of the Spiritfarer mantle over more than a century.

fields.name: The One Thousand
fields.content:
Abilities:
Super Speed
Super Strength
Shapeshifting
Resistance to most damage types

Headquarters:
Lost Hope's Post

Origin:
Unknown
